import React from 'react'; import styles from "../ProductsList/ProductsList.module.css"; import favorite from '../../img/favorite.svg' import productImg from '../../img/oil.jpg' import Rater from 'react-rater' const url = 'https://dok.dbroker.com.ua/' const Card = ({brand_name, product_title, available, rating, url_direct, rating_count, price, product_image_alt}, product_id) => { return (
{brand_name} {product_title} {this.rating > 0 ? : null } {rating_count > 0 ? `(${rating_count} рекомендации)` : null }
{price}грн
{available > 0 ? 'Есть в наличии' : Под заказ, 13 дней}
Купить
); }; export default Card;
